title: Is Bill Gates still interested in hacking? If so, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not sure that he was ever interested in hacking to the extent you imply. Starting at a young age, he was focused primarily on developing software, and then growing a company. Since he left Microsoft, it's pretty clear his full attention has been on philanthropy and learning as much as he can about the world's problems that he can bring the resources of his and his wife's foundation to bear on.

IT IS BECOZ HACKERS ARE THE HEROES OF THE UPCOMING REVOLUTION.... HE WAS A HACKER HIMSELF, (read his biography while he was in school) AND HE KNOWS THE ESSENCE OF A HACKER. A SKILLED HACKED IF WISHES, CAN DISRUPT HIS ENTIRE ONLINE LIFE AND HIS COMPANY WITHING A FEW DAYS.... AND IF HE WISHES CAN ASLO DEVELOP STRONG SECURITY WITHING HIS PROGRAMS OF MICROSOFT.... IN SHORT A HACKER RULES THE DIGITAL LIFE OF MILLIONS... AND HE KNOWS IT
